frames.name: run1
frames.description: The horse's head is at the top of the picture, and its rump is at the bottom, galloping with front legs extended forward，back legs extended backward, mane flowing

frames.name: run2
frames.description: The horse's head is at the top of the picture, and its rump is at the bottom, galloping with all legs tucked back

frames.name: run3
frames.description: The horse's head is at the top of the picture, and its rump is at the bottom, galloping with back legs pushing off

frames.name: run4
frames.description: The horse's head is at the top of the picture, and its rump is at the bottom, galloping with front legs stretched out

frames.name: idle
frames.description: The horse's head is at the top of the picture, and its rump is at the bottom, standing still，Top-down (bird's-eye) view

frames.name: jump
frames.description: The horse's head is at the top of the picture, and its rump is at the bottom, leaping upward with front legs raised high,Top-down (bird's-eye) view

frames.name: hit
frames.description: The horse's head is at the top of the picture, and its rump is at the bottom, stumbling backward, off balance,Top-down (bird's-eye) view
